Class LoggerImplement

java.lang.Object
listenerutil.LoggerImplement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public class LoggerImplement extends Object implements Logger
LoggerImplement class that implements the Logger interface to provide logging functionality using ExtentReports. It allows logging of test results, information, exceptions, and screenshots.
Since:
2025-06-02
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ravi Shankar

  • Constructor Details

    • LoggerImplement

      public LoggerImplement(com.aventstack.extentreports.ExtentTest test)
      Constructor for LoggerImplement class. Initializes the logger with an ExtentTest instance.
      Parameters:
      test - The ExtentTest instance to be used for logging. * @see ExtentTest * @description This constructor sets up the logger to log messages to the specified ExtentTest instance. * It is used to log test results, information, exceptions, and screenshots during test execution.
